verses.roman:
ananta nityānanda-gaṇa--ke karu gaṇana
ātma-pavitratā-hetu likhilāṅ kata jana

synonyms: ananta—unlimited; nityānanda-gaṇa—followers of Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu; ke karu—who can; gaṇana—count; ātma-pavitratā—of self-purification; hetu—for the reason; likhilāṅ—I have written; kata jana—some of them.
translation: No one can count the unlimited followers of Nityānanda Prabhu. I have mentioned some of them just for my self-purification.
